short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Notifies you about unread items in your The Old Reader account
short.cs: Tento doplněk vás upozorní na nepřečtené položky z vašeho účtu The Old Reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension provides a toolbar icon to notify you about unread items in your The Old Reader account, and context menu items to quickly subscribe to or bookmark a page.

Also provides support for [b] shortcut in The Old Reader (open in background)
long.cs:
This extension provides a toolbar icon to notify you about unread items in your The Old Reader account, and context menu items to quickly subscribe to or bookmark a page.

New: Also provides support for [b] shortcut in The Old Reader (open in background)
